data.title: V. N. Janaki
data.meta_description: Vaikom Narayani Janaki, also known as Janaki Ramachandran, was an Indian politician, actress and activist who served as the chief minister of Tamil Nadu for 23 days after the death of her husband M. G. Ramachandran, former chief minister of Tamil Nadu. She was the first woman to become the chief minister of Tamil Nadu. She was also the first actress to become the chief minister in the history of India.
data.text:
Indian actor and politician / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Dear Wikiwand AI, let's keep it short by simply answering these key questions:

Can you list the top facts and stats about V. N. Janaki?

Summarize this article for a 10 year old

SHOW ALL QUESTIONS

This is a matronymic name. The person is referred to as Janaki and not as Vaikom Narayani.

Vaikom Narayani Janaki (30 November 1923[1] â€“ 19 May 1996), also known as Janaki Ramachandran,[3] was an Indian politician, actress and activist who served as the chief minister of Tamil Nadu for 23 days after the death of her husband M. G. Ramachandran, former chief minister of Tamil Nadu. She was the first woman to become the chief minister of Tamil Nadu. She was also the first actress to become the chief minister in the history of India.
